technology: There were no technical difficulties experienced by the participant.
cur_neg_affect: The participant expresses some negative affect about the pandemic, mentioning the stress of being at home and the change in lifestyle.
past_neg_affect: The participant recalls feeling uneasy about the pandemic at the beginning, not fully understanding the magnitude of what was going on.
communal_orientation: The participant engages in active listening and asks follow-up questions, showing a moderate level of engagement and interest in the conversation partner's experiences.
engagement: The participant is actively engaged in the conversation, sharing their experiences and asking questions of their partner.
defensiveness: The participant does not display any defensive behaviors or statements.
questions: What was your experience getting the vaccine? (00:27:03)
Do you still take precautions to not get infected? (00:21:26)
vaccine_importance: The participant is pro-vaccine and got the vaccine as soon as it was available to them.
booster_importance: The participant got a booster shot and was planning on getting the Omicron booster.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrates a moderate level of cognitive complexity by recognizing the different perspectives on the pandemic and acknowledging the challenges faced by others.
general_notes: The participant is very open and willing to share their experiences. They are also very respectful of their conversation partner.
